annotations.description: It was an entertaining 90 minutes of football. Both sides had good opportunities. Barcelona were better today and displayed masterful control and movement. The strategy of the home side was to control the pace of the match with possession style football. Whereas the strategy of the away side was a bit risky and reliant on solid defending to dispossess the opponent and break fast.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The referee blows for the end of today's match.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: 1 additional min. will be played.
Freddy Hinestroza (Getafe) is caught offside!

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Sergio Escudero (Getafe) launches a powerful cross from the corner into the box, but the ball is intercepted by the defender.
Sergio Escudero (Getafe) takes the free kick from a long way out but the defender manages to get it clear. The referee blows his whistle, Getafe are awarded a corner kick.
Martin Montoya (Barcelona) commits a rough foul. David Fernandez Borbalan stops the game and makes a call. Getafe are given an advantage. They have a free kick.
The ball is cleared after Lionel Messi (Barcelona) attempted to dribble past an opposing player.
Barcelona enjoy a period of possession as they are exchanging some passes and waiting for an opportunity to strike.
Sergio Escudero (Getafe) attempts to surprise the keeper with a nice shot, but it lacks more accuracy and goes way wide of the left post.
Marc Bartra (Barcelona) attempts to score as he rises near the penalty spot and heads the ball to the middle of the goal. Guaita pulls off a comfortable save to stop the ball from hitting the net.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Neymar (Barcelona) decides to take a short corner instead of crossing into the box.

Lionel Messi (Barcelona) takes the free kick from the edge of the box, but Guaita dives superbly to deny him. His shot went towards the left side of the goal. The ball is out of play and the linesman points at the corner flag. Corner to Barcelona.

Mehdi Lacen (Getafe) carelessly slides into the feet of his opponent and he'll be lucky to avoid punishment. David Fernandez Borbalan blows for the foul but keeps his cards in his pocket on this occasion. Barcelona earn a free kick which could lead to a goal scoring opportunity.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Emiliano Buendia (Getafe) sends in the corner, but the keeper steps in and makes a save.

Ivi (Getafe) was all set to receive a beautiful pass into a promising position. However, one of the defenders makes a timely clearance. Getafe have been awarded a corner kick. The referee and one of his assistants both point at the corner flag.
Ivi (Getafe) is adjudged to have been offside when making his run.

annotations.label: attendance
annotations.description: The attendance for today's match is 65356.
Neymar (Barcelona) is forced to stop his attacking move after the linesman signals for offside.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: It is time for a substitution. Sergio Escudero (Getafe) is on for Pedro Leon.
Luis Suarez (Barcelona) produces a cunning chipped pass for Lionel Messi, who takes it down well but fails to get past the defenders and loses the ball.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Lionel Messi (Barcelona) works the corner short instead of sending the ball into the penalty area.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) sends a cross into the box, but the opposition's defence clears the ball to safety. Barcelona will take a corner kick.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Lionel Messi (Barcelona) takes a short corner kick.

Lionel Messi (Barcelona) darts into the penalty area to latch on to a pass, and he unleashes a low shot in the direction of the left post. Guaita is alert and denies him with a nice save. The ball is out of play. Barcelona will have a chance to score from a corner.

OFF THE POST! Freddy Hinestroza (Getafe) drifts into the box to give his teammate support. He receives a fantastic pass and shoots from close range, but it crashes against the right post! It could have been a brilliant goal, unlucky.
Luis Suarez (Barcelona) receives a pass and tries his luck with a low shot from 22 metres out. Guaita pulls off a comfortable save to stop the effort going into the middle of the net.
Neymar (Barcelona) whips a promising cross into the box, but the opposition's defence intercepts the ball.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Dani Alves will be replaced by Martin Montoya (Barcelona).
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) goes on a solo run, but he fails to create a chance as an opposition player blocks him.
Close! Luis Suarez (Barcelona) is a whisker away from finishing off the move he started. His close range effort flies just over the bar.
What a goal scoring opportunity! Neymar (Barcelona) finds some space inside the box and gets in a strike, but the shot is brilliantly blocked by one of the defending players sliding in.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The referee signals that it is time for a substitution and Alex Felip (Getafe) comes onto the pitch so that Juan Rodriguez can be given a rest.
Dani Alves (Barcelona) makes a reckless foul in order to win the ball from his opponent. David Fernandez Borbalan has a clear sight of it and blows his whistle.
Jeremy Mathieu (Barcelona) makes a bad challenge and the referee blows his whistle for a foul.
Jeremy Mathieu (Barcelona) slides a pass forward, but one of the defenders cuts it out.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Today's match ends for Xavi who will be replaced by Pedro (Barcelona).
Getafe are bossing possession of the ball and make numerous short passes, but they finally lose possession after an error.
Ivi (Getafe) latches onto a brilliant cross and fires the ball towards goal, but his shot goes high over the crossbar.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Pedro Leon (Getafe) takes the corner but only sends it into a huddle of the defenders and one of them makes a good clearance.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Pedro Leon (Getafe) works the corner short. Good work from Getafe as they win a corner.
Juan Rodriguez (Getafe) whips the ball in from the long range free kick, but the first man gets it clear. Getafe have been awarded a corner kick.
Neymar (Barcelona) makes a rough challenge and the referee blows for a foul. Getafe win a free kick and will be able to apply some pressure on the opposition goal.
Ivi (Getafe) attempts to find his teammate with a pass from outside the box, but the opposition's defence is quick to react and thwarts the attack.
Poor challenge! Dani Alves (Barcelona) is penalised for tripping and David Fernandez Borbalan blows his whistle.
Luis Suarez (Barcelona) commits a foul after unfairly battling his opponent for the ball.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The referee signals that it is time for a substitution and Ivi (Getafe) is coming onto the pitch as Baba cannot continue after picking up an injury.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal Lionel Messi (Barcelona)! Lionel Messi (Barcelona) was put through by Luis Suarez and he showed brilliant composure inside the box to fire into the top of the net. 6:0.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Luis Enrique makes a half time substitution. Sergi Roberto (Barcelona) comes on in place of Sergio Busquets.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: Everything is set for the start of the second half.

We have seen an attractive offensive game so far and the fans have nothing to complain about. Barcelona dominated the opening period and easily created the most chances. The home team makes a lot of passes and attempts to maintain possession, while the visitors look to counter attack.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: That is it for the first half after the referee blows his whistle and the players head to their respective dressing rooms.
Close! Adriano (Barcelona) picks up the ball in space and from inside the penalty area sends a shot inches wide of the right post.
Good clearance! Luis Suarez (Barcelona) received a low pass, but he didn't have time to do anything as one of the defenders quickly stole the ball off him.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Xavi slips it to Luis Suarez (Barcelona) on the edge of the box and he finds the right side of the net with a great effort. The score is 5:0.

annotations.label: funfact
annotations.description: 73:27 – this is the current ball possession ratio.
Xavi (Barcelona) and Lionel Messi attempt to exchange short two yard passes, but the opposition's defence intercepts the ball.
Guaita is alert and has a clear sight of a long through ball from Sergio Busquets (Barcelona). Easy save!
Sergio Busquets (Barcelona) hammers the ball from far out, but his shot is blocked by an opposition player.
Neymar (Barcelona) attempts to find one of his teammates with a sweet pass into the box, but one of the defending players reacts well and intercepts the effort.
The game is interrupted as Freddy Hinestroza (Getafe) is flagged offside.
Luis Suarez (Barcelona) delivers a low pass into the box which is intercepted.
David Fernandez Borbalan couldn't ignore the rough tackle by Dani Alves (Barcelona) and blew his whistle.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Neymar passes to Xavi (Barcelona), who collects the ball and unleashes a terrific shot from the edge of the box. His effort goes inside the right post. Fabulous goal! The score is 4:0.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Fantastic team goal! Neymar (Barcelona) was set free in the area by Luis Suarez and he made no mistake with a lovely finish into the bottom left corner. 3:0.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Pedro Leon (Getafe) rolls the ball short to a teammate from the corner instead of sending a cross into the box.

Emiliano Buendia (Getafe) gets on the end of a pass and produces a promising first time shot towards the bottom left corner. His effort is blocked by Claudio Bravo with a brilliant diving save! Getafe will have a chance to score from a corner kick.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: It's a goal! Lionel Messi plays the ball to the feet of Luis Suarez (Barcelona), who hits a tremendous first time shot inside the right post. The goalkeeper was unable to keep it out. 2:0.
Emiliano Velazquez (Getafe) finds enough space to climb high and plants a header well wide of the right post. What a poor effort.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Pedro Leon (Getafe) looks like he will be the one to take the corner kick.
Freddy Hinestroza (Getafe) fails to find any of his teammates inside the box as his pass is blocked. The ball goes out for a corner. Getafe can continue in their attacking effort.
Luis Suarez (Barcelona) aims for the middle of the goal, but that's an easy job for the goalkeeper. It will take more than that to test him!
Marc Bartra (Barcelona) leaps highest to meet the resulting corner and attempts to head home, but the effort goes harmlessly wide of the left post.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Xavi (Barcelona) is heading toward the corner flag to take the set piece.

Luis Suarez (Barcelona) races towards goal but the defender gets back well to make a challenge. The ball goes behind for a corner. Barcelona will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) receives a precise pass on the edge of the box and shoots. His poorly placed shot flies well wide of the right post.
Neymar (Barcelona) produces a lovely ball into the penalty area but the defender manages to intercept and comfortably averts the danger.
Baba (Getafe) seems to be alright and is okay to carry on.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: The game is interrupted now, Baba (Getafe) picks up a knock and the physio has to come on.
Baba (Getafe) came close to scoring. He connected with a pass inside the box and perhaps should have done better than direct his shot straight at Claudio Bravo.
Freddy Hinestroza (Getafe) makes a good run to meet a precise cross just outside the box. He latches on to it and strikes the ball, but the goalkeeper pulls off a brilliant save.
A dangerous towering header by Rafinha (Barcelona) from around the penalty spot goes just over the bar. This corner kick didn't change the score.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: There's an opportunity for Xavi (Barcelona) to deliver the ball into the box from a corner.
Xavi (Barcelona) takes the free kick but it is cleared by the first defender. It will be a corner kick for Barcelona.
Mehdi Lacen (Getafe) was too fierce in his attempt to get the ball from his opponent and David Fernandez Borbalan blows for a foul. Another situation results in a direct free kick for Barcelona.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) tries to send a pass but it's blocked.
Barcelona are bossing possession at the moment by exchanging some precise passes from player to player.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: With a cheeky finish ala Antonin Panenka, Lionel Messi (Barcelona) scores from the penalty spot.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) will take the responsibility and he is already preparing the ball.

annotations.label: penalty
annotations.description: David Fernandez Borbalan blows his whistle after Alvaro Arroyo (Getafe) kicks an opponent's legs instead of the ball. The advantage of a penalty kick is given to Barcelona.
Dangerous play by Pedro Leon (Getafe). David Fernandez Borbalan blows his whistle for a foul.
Dani Alves (Barcelona) connects with a pass inside the box, but his effort goes well wide of the left post.
Roberto Lago (Getafe) clips an inviting cross into the box, but there's no one in a position to get on the end of it.
Dani Alves (Barcelona) aims for the middle of the goal, but that's an easy job for the goalkeeper. It will take more than that to test him!
Jeremy Mathieu (Barcelona) fails to send a pass into the box as his effort is cut out.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: Here we go, today's match is starting right now.
The players are on the pitch and Barcelona will have the kick off.
David Fernandez Borbalan was nominated as the referee for this game.

annotations.label: lineup1
annotations.description: The starting XIs were already announced and you can go through them in the Lineups section.
Hello and welcome to our minute by minute commentary of the upcoming clash. We will try to provide you with as accurate as possible picture of the happenings on the pitch. Have fun.

It was an entertaining 90 minutes of football. Both sides had good opportunities. Barcelona were better today and displayed masterful control and movement. The strategy of the home side was to control the pace of the match with possession style football. Whereas the strategy of the away side was a bit risky and reliant on solid defending to dispossess the opponent and break fast.
